title: gifting chromas
body: hey, i was trying to gift my friend one of the poppy chromas (she told me she only had two of em but wanted more) and was having trouble finding the chromas in the gifting center. i checked under the "gift a skin" tab but couldn't find it there. i tried both the updated and legacy clients and wasn't having luck with either. can i get some feedback on finding chromas in the gifting center? am i just looking in the wrong place or is something else up

replies.body:
Unfortunately, the Gifting Center doesn't support gifting Chromas right now. The best way to get those chromas to your friend would be to gift them some RP through the gifting center.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
